name: Visual Revolution
description:
This is a short game about a girl named Momo who is an android with an obsession with her phone.  She also uses peach juice as fuel.

When she was being made her " world information" microchip malfunctioned and only absorbed things related to fashion from the database of the world.  However, this comes in handy when some mysterious evil forces are turning the people in town into mindless minimalist zombies who dress in boring and ugly clothes.

Momo is a strong advocate for maximalism and the many awesome subgenres of fashion that it spawned. So, she will fight the zombies of the world and find out who is behind all of this.

Made for MMP270 spring 2021 class.
